website_summaries.verdict: A competitively-priced indoor security camera with pan-and-tilt functionality and great video quality, but the lack of cloud storage may put some off.

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to monitor my baby. However it keep you disconnect from streaming. You have to request streaming every five min. I am at kitchen and doing my job and can't request streaming again and again. It is baby monitor camera, and you should be able to do so until you wish. Another thing when you click on streaming on google Hub display sometimes it can't connect and you have to do it again and again. However with the Tapo app you can control camera easier. If you need to monitor your baby it is good you find BETTER SOLUTION.
customer_reviews.author: Biabangard

customer_reviews.title: Requires location services to be enabled and can't be installed otherwise..
customer_reviews.text: I do not want to have to flag the exact location of the camera as I believe that represents a security issue if the server is compromised. The installation steps require you do this and as a result I have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mr John A Beaven

customer_reviews.title: TP link camera
customer_reviews.text: A very poor quality image in day light and in night-vision. The image looks cloudy and unfocused. The image is so poor compared to other WiFi cameras I have, I sent the first one back for a replacement. The replacement is just a poor. I can only describe the image as foggy and blur. Not a good camera. I expected better considering this camera links to Amazon Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: RobinX

customer_reviews.title: SD Slot and Alexa compatible
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a camera that had an SD card slot and Alexa Compatible.. Found it! Cheap as well. ! For the price the picture is fine and the camera quality is fine. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Millam

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably good camera only concern is that the security on app might be a bit low the green light keeps on turning on and off even when private mode is on its almost seam someone else has been watching us 👀
customer_reviews.author: Derren

customer_reviews.title: Great picture even on night vision.
customer_reviews.text: I use these cameras for security. I have one in the kitchen and one in the dining room facing the windows. Picture quality is really clear, including night vision. The cameras also have audible and visual alarms built in, the alarm is quite loud, and there is also a bright flashing light on the front. These alarms are linked to any movement detected by the camera and would frighten off any potential burglar. They are also linked to my smart phone and also Alexa. I tried them when I was out one day through my mobile about 15 miles from home. The picture and sound was fantastic. I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: geoffwalters

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently changed from an unbranded ip camera to this for my dog cam. I wanted to be able to check on my dog both away from home but also overnight. Safe to say I am super impressed with this camera. App is so easy to use with picture quality being fantastic. Can log onto to it from anywhere in the world which setting up was so easy. Night vision is phenomenal almost better than day vision. My dog just loves sleeping in the weirdest positions!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Frustratingly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Set up was really straightforward. Picture quality in both day and night mode was very good. Unfortunately that was the extent of the good bits. In the app it constantly shows the camera as offline or says no internet even though I could stream podcasts/radio. Motion detection at default level is erratic (sometimes no detection even though you walk straight in front of the camera and other times detection with no obvious movement) and often delayed. As it couldn't be relied upon it went back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo's Lovechild

customer_reviews.title: Bargain, high quality, security camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a bargain. I have one set up in the hallway, pointing at the front door, with a sharp lens and hi def picture. Super reliable, just make sure you buy a good quality micro sd card. Viewing is easy on your mobile phone or tablet, anywhere in the world, you can link up to 30 cameras, brilliant for the money. Recording all the time or when activated through the card, or footage can be recorded on your iPhone/ android or tablet live. If you have any fears about home security, a couple of these will sort your fears out. You can even tell the culprit to clear off!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought 6 now, they’re so good
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant quality & value, I can’t rate this product highly enough, i now have 6 over my house & garden gym studio, really easy to set up, great quality picture & crystal clear sound, I’ve bought the sd cards also to record on & it automatically rewrites over old recording, I’ve checked the recording & it’s just brilliant so glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to checkout our pet dog when left alone. Very pleased with the result. Easy to set up using the link to the app. I did have a problem formatting the 128gb SD Card which I purchased at the same time. The camera refused to formal it and I did receive plenty of support via email. I was able to format a 32gb without any problems. I note from other reviews that others had similar problems with the 128gb. I would advise to ignore a 128gb and use a 32gb which gives a massive 4/5 24hour recording. If this is not sufficient a 64gb will double this.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Camera offline
customer_reviews.text: Took ages to set up. Would not connect. Was happy yesterday when i was at home but have now found this does not work when I am not at home. Camera is offline. My other cameras work which are a different make. Not fit for purpose as was bought to view dogs. Have not been able to all day. Will send back if this is not resolved as no point.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Absolutely amazing. Less than five minutes to set up. Great quality. Great sound. Great picture. (I’ve whited out registrations of cars). If it’s looking out a window (through the glass) and you are using it on night mode there is a glare and you can only see the reflection of the camera but that’s not the cameras fault...it’s just physics! Night mode not looking through a glass window is brilliant. I want to buy more but don’t really have a need for more! Lol. You can have up to 32 cameras registered to the app so if you want them for different properties you can do that. Incredible product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amoruso_04

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these for indoor use. The first one to monitor our back garden as we have a hot tub (thieves are on the prowl) carefully read reviews before purchase and they do live up to the expectation. We have some issues with lighting so had to adjust the positioning of the cameras slightly; we have figured out the logistics of the garden one, just not the one we use to monitor the drive. May purchase some PIR sensors to work along side to help with lighting. Other than that really good quality cameras, easy to use, easy to set up and can be used in conjunction with the Echo Show 8
customer_reviews.author: Suziebaby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing as a baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: I think it's really bad as a baby monitor. The video last only for a minute or so before you have to press the play button again. getting into the "more" section works once every three tries and when there sometimes it fails to show you live feed so have to go out and back in again. This is after the latest update that seems to have fixed a few other issues but without a permanent live view I can't give it more than one star as a baby monitor. My xiomi security camera is a better baby monitor than this unfortunately it doesn't have the pan/tilt I really wanted
customer_reviews.author: Taimur Khan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as a continuous monitor
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a couple of days so this isn't a long term review. First impressions are good: the unit looks ok, if a bit plasticky, and offers good functionality, especially at this price point. Video in all conditions is good, but capped at 15 fps. If that's ok for you then really there's little to complain about. Sound too is ok. The only reason I've marked it down is because live streaming to Google Nest Hub is limited to 5 minutes, then shuts off. This renders it unsuitable for longer monitoring, which was one of my main requirements. Also, I haven't yet been able to stream live to a Chromecast.
customer_reviews.author: JonC

customer_reviews.title: For this price, I don't think you can get anything better
customer_reviews.text: It is great for indoor use, records and you can set up different options for recording. Picture quality is not top but it is not bad at all. Hvae 2 settings HQ and LQ. Motion detection is great and you can setup areas if you want to limit the size of area for motion detection. You can use it for outdoor monitoring while keeping it inside the window but at night time, the night mode cannot be used due to the IR light relfecting back at the camera. Neat little camera with easy to setup and great app support.
customer_reviews.author: @li

customer_reviews.title: Worth the bit extra cash to get a solid device with decent software.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the bit extra cash to get a solid device with decent software. All the cheap other ones have issues with the software they use. I’ve tried many and they all use various poor 3rd party apps. Considering that’s how you use these things it’s critical to get the software spot on. You will pay a bit more for these but they have there own TP made software that’s very clean and simple. Got 2 cameras. Hooked them both up in no time at all. The software lets me switch between them really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera to monitor the communal door as we get "undesirables" trying to get in to take drugs. Works well, but be aware its not as good if your filming thru a window. Setup was easy - and easily links to your echo show. Recordings can be saved to an SDCard - but if you want the camera recording to your pc - google "i Spy" an open source software. Instructions can be found on the Tapo Website. This way you can have the feed on a separate pc screen, and not rely on the android software just on your phone or tablet. Happy with Purchase. May buy another!
customer_reviews.author: roger robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. App is good. Quality image. Motion detection good
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says on the tin. Works perfectly apart from one occasion when it stopped recording detections. A format of the sd card sorted it. Night vision won't work if you are pointing it out a window as it just blinds itself with the infrared reflection. (I taped up the light and bought a separate ir illumator to solve that) not ideal but works. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randomamazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing value for money
customer_reviews.text: I can’t quite believe how much you get for £25 with the Tapo C200. The motorised pan and tilt works well, and is a great feature. The video quality is sharp with good light, although the colours are a little off. The app is easy to use, and has lots of handy features such as motion detection notifications, and the ability to stream the live or recorded streams. It also optionally records onto a microSD. I found the camera easy to install, and it works well. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dialogue

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but lacking features
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for the price point, but it does not seem to be fully compliant with ONVIF specs. Specifically, PTZ isn't supported so while you can view your camera feed using third-party applications (which you'll have to do if you want to view feeds on a computer) you cannot control the pan and tilt. This can only be done using the mobile application. For most people I don't know if this would be a problem, but it's worth bearing in mind that using something like ZoneMinder, Shinobi, iSpy etc. will limit the functionality of the cam.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little camera , you are pretty limited and stuck within the Tapo app but I’m sure updates will come, Ie, There is no patrol mode - just virtual and horizontal scan... Great build quality only thing is I would like the base to be slightly heavier, just so the cable doesn’t pull it out of position when using stand alone. Almost silent operating, when moving! the speaker is reasonably loud for when you want to two way call or alarm; however the design choice to put it at the rear of the camera has obvious sound issues. Great buy if you are looking to secure a property instantly! Will be getting 2 more!..
customer_reviews.author: JonySmoke

customer_reviews.title: Nice bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine to spy on 2 new cats. Picture both during day light and night hours is great. Through the use of the App you can move the camera (left - Right and up and Down) to a decent arc with only a small delay which takes a bit of getting used to. Setup was not very fiddly, biggest issue is the requirement for a none 5Ghz wifi connection so you may have to downscale your current modem to set it up then its fine (Virgin). There are plenty setup guides out there online to talk you through it.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie G

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: First of all its very easy to setup 2 cctv paired in less than 10 min . The software Tapo is very handy. I use motion detection however i couldn't change notifications on my phone dedicated for motion alarm The picture quality is ok For price it not bad The detection motion isn't very precise so i was a bit disappointed. Perfect for child care since u can use with Alexa Echo show For security unfortunately in my opinion i give a 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: It is good indoor camera with clear vision, clear 2 way audio and immediate alert when detectin body motion. The night vision is good enough to see what’s happened. Easy to install, compare with the other one outdoor camera that I bought at the same time. This is worth to buy with this value price. This is not a first time to buy an indoor camera, hopefully don’t broken after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that this is the budget end of TP-Link's range of cameras but even so I was not impressed with the picture quality when compared to similar priced cameras, the camera was also jerky and noisy when rotating. Most other cameras have standardized on micro USB for power but this has its own transformer and connector which I find an inconvenience. On the plus side it supports the RTSP protocol and therefore is not tied to a bespoke cloud server for remote viewing/recording.
customer_reviews.author: Gnasher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality footage and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Great image quality during both the day and night and even when on the "low quality" mode that you can enable for better performance. Recommend leaving it on daylight mode if placed in a window and facing out into a well lit area though in order to pick up the most detail and less reflections. I like that once a micro sd card is added too that it can be set to continuously record, that and being able to look back the next day at these recordings using the app and save bits from them that stand out. If you're worried about something you own being at risk such as your car or house then I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: The price I paid for this pan and tilt indoor camera does not reflect the quality and features provided. It simply works straight out of the box. Night Vision works well. The video quality is exceptional. You can set it up in the phoen app., to be viewed remotely without having to setup dynamic IP adresses etc. You can add a SD card to record. A great indoor pan and tilt camera. If you are in two minds about buying it, then don't be, it's a great camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Newkie Nick

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant lil device
customer_reviews.text: I recently had the catalytic converters stolen off my Prius and was VERY P*****off about it!! To prevent it or help it if it got stolen again I bought this lil camera. In short it’s brilliant, does what it says on the box. Mine is setup using my iphone7 and works flawlessly, I highly recommend it!! Cannot be beaten in price vs performance. At night turn off I fared less and use outdoor pir lights or as I do, street lights!! Picture is night time using street lights
customer_reviews.author: The G's down Falmouth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, easy to use and sync.
customer_reviews.text: wow...love this camera, such a great camera and picture quality for such a low price. Bought a 2nd one the next day, easy to link up, activate and deactivate, easy to use, i have made a call through them from 50 miles away, just to test it out. Fantastic, can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Josiebobs

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity and streaming problems
customer_reviews.text: The camera looses connection frequently. Streaming to google hub is almost impossible as it looses connection or freezes. Almost the same with Alexa echo show.... It looses connection and freezes even with the app !! Waste of money !
customer_reviews.author: Nikos

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money however I am concerned about data collection
customer_reviews.text: Its good value camera for indoor use and the tilt functionality is useful. The notifications are timely during daytime, however if you keep it near window facing outside, it won't detect motion in the night. On major concern is privacy and data collection by this Chinese company. The camera requires access to Location for setup and their website says this is for increased "data protection". Technically this is FALSE. You don't need GPS location for storing WiFi access parameters into the Camera. Now the company knows your location, the Wifi around that location and possibility of accessing camera view if that is at all required. This is valuable data mining for profits!
customer_reviews.author: dealicon

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality but short on features
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera but it seems to be entire aimed only at monitoring a baby. It would be good for that but I have a different application. To key features not available are (1) the ability to upload using FTP an image to a website and (2) the ability to view the camera when away from the house. That requires port forwarding on the router and this camera doesn't support that.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Worst product DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I give 1 star , unfortunately there is no ZERO, otherwise i give this camera A BIG zero. Its took almist my good 2 hours and could contact to my network, i made sure that my network set on 2.4ghz because this camera support ont 2.4. Done everything reset, switch off and on, restart app, restart my router. Any way worst product i ever bought from Amazon and im sending it back. DO NOT buy pay bit extra and buy decent product. Rubbish product.
customer_reviews.author: Usban

customer_reviews.title: Good quality picture and great price
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what to expect from a camera of this price. We are delighted with the picture quality and being able to pan the view from your phone via the app is great. We have linked two cameras so far and switching between them is fab via the phone app. Easy to set up camera, easy to set up the app and when you purchase an sd card and insert into camera, easy to format the sd card through the phone app too. Very delighted with this product and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love these cameras
customer_reviews.text: These are superb little security cameras that can be sited anywhere there is power and reach of the WiFi network. Set up is simple using the Tapo app, and the control of the cameras is highly intuitive and simple. These cameras record to SD card which must be bought separately. 32GB is good enough with Motion Detection for quite a while, depending on the amount of motion of course. The recorded files can be played back via the app, saved and sent on if required. Look out for these on sale for around £24 each, which is outstanding value. They typically retail on Amazon for £34. These have become my Go To cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, feature rich app, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: had it for a few days now & really like this camera. The tapo app is feature packed & works well. setup took about 5mins, bought a 64GB micro SD card for recording & mounted in my kitchen window. I have an open plan lounge/kitchen & the camera is clear enough (even at night) to see the whole area. I can also rotate the camera from my phone to see the garden. Motion detection is very good, though I do get an alert when the camera switches from day mode to night vision... not sure what's going on there, but no big deal. Overall, I'm impressed, would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pet Cam!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best budget camera going, you can do so much with this camera for such a reasonable price. The picture quality is perfect and does an amazing job at keeping an eye on our little fury friend. You can move camera easily from the app and the two way audio works great. Unfortunately the camera doesn’t record all the time but when in the app you can record anything you need too. Perfect pet cam for anyone wanting one!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: No PTZ control via API
customer_reviews.text: So it has ONVIF and RTSP which is great since you can use this camera with your own NAS/NVR setup and don't need to use cloud. Unfortunately the ONVIF profile it support doesn't not support PTZ or rather PT since this camera has no zoom. So if you want to watch the stream outside app that's fine, but for rotating the camera you need to open the app I'm afraid. Would be amazing if TP Link fixed this / added this feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy little device
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too good with computer things, after a few attempts I managed to get it all up and running OK! I purchased a separate SD card and the picture quality looks OK so far. I bought it as I'm going away and wanted to be able to check in on my tortoise as my family will be taking care of him. I haven't recorded a long period yet but plan on giving it a full day's trial tomorrow and go from there. The functions are easy to use once you get going, my voice sounds strange when I use speaker, maybe interface when too close to the device. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena k

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to keep an eye on the dogs whilst at work. Really pleased with the ease of setup, and quality of video it offers. Setup is straightforward, just turn it on and follow the in app instructions (I installed on android). Once setup, just leave it running. Motion detection is great and I can now spy on my dogs whilst im at work. turns out they just mostly sleep on the settee's... how boring!
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Tapo c200 home security cam wifi
customer_reviews.text: great product easy to set up after installing the app on your phone,after inserting sd card power up cam and app follow the instructions on the app your good to go in 20mins,there are different options on the app for the cam ie you can have alerts sent to your phone or just use it for recording motion detected ect all explained fully in the app,finding the right app for the cam took awhile on playstore because of lack of info that comes with the cam,but once up and running its a great piece of kit too add to your home security system !
customer_reviews.author: will bass

customer_reviews.title: Image quality good, night vision hampered by windows
customer_reviews.text: Night vision only works if looking inside or the unit to kept outside but as it’s not waterproof then this isn’t possible; if it’s left inside looking out through a window then the night vision red light reflect off the glass window and thus gives no image. If turned off then there’s too much noise to be used accurately using street lighting. Sound isn’t the best either with stuttering. Otherwise image quality is very good during the day and plenty of control on the unit. Although stated as a micro SD storage only option others have reported that you can add it to some types of video surveillance systems.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Moore

customer_reviews.title: The overall quality is good, but they are faulty or something!
customer_reviews.text: The reason i give 1 star is because after 1 month of use, the camera started rebooting by itself without any option activated to do so, and its very annoying during the night when it does that allmoste eveey hour. I think it started when i updated to latest firmware, so hopefully TP-Link will fix this! Crap camera, and very noisy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Edwin Modiga

customer_reviews.title: These are great, highly useful cameras
customer_reviews.text: First off .. I have 3 of these carefully placed around my home ... They were invaluable as security/peace of mind cameras during lock down and worth every penny. The good -They are very reliable - easy to set up and use - great quality .. 360deg rotation The bad - Nothing too bad .. you need an uninterrupted internet connection ... and a good router if you have multiple smart devices The ugly - If you set multiple cameras up, the night vision leds can set off the motion detectors on the other cameras(careful placement is needed) I'd recommend these to any one ... Great for home use ...
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Patience required!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent for the price. Motion detector works well BUT... App is average as- it seems to get confused when you playback and go back to cam. Confused when you use the away and home locating buttons. Confused when you just keep the app open to long. I could go on. Had to reinstall a few times as after a confusion the motion detector gives up! Keep operation basic now, privacy mode when home and turn it on when im not. Works fine like this and for 20 pounds i get an eye at my home. NOTE. it does not work with fire tv or a smart device without a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality. Easy to set up. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic cameras. I already had the Tapo 360 and decided to add this Tapo mini to it. Simple installation, simple to pair and image quality is 1080p and really crisp clear. Never had any drop outs, works over 4G too without any hassle. Put a 32Gb Micro SD card in and mine lasts well over a month (depending on how much movement detection is going on, obviously). Quite small, looks good, sound quality seems more than acceptable. WELL WORTH £19.99 (offer as of 6/9/2020). I think you can add up to 32 cameras to the app. Would I buy again?, absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Andy10

customer_reviews.title: Ideal security camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product. It gives motion alerts that goes to your mobile using the app when away from home. You can also just check the room it's fitted at any time away from home so if you have a pet you can keep an eye on them. The adjustment for moving the lens to the correct position by using the app in the room is a bonus. It's at a reasonable price which would suit most people's pockets.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Useless so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera set it up was happy l. Noticed it needed a firmware update so did that. Now have no picture Assistance useless. Cannot get any tech support. I have ordered a replacement but not holding my breath that the next will be any different
customer_reviews.author: Jenny G.

customer_reviews.title: Item was faulty
customer_reviews.text: Item was faulty, sound and mic didn't work. Also when the unit turned around to change viewing angles it made a noise. Sent back for refund,
customer_reviews.author: cdw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap CCTV Camera That Performs Well For What it's Intended To Do
customer_reviews.text: We've got some Blink cameras but we bought a couple of these because they do continuous live recording. For the price it's very good value but it's not going to compete with a hard-wired CCTV system & it's not intended to compete with one. For a WiFi based system it does all we want it to do which is to alert us to movement & to record it or to monitor it live from time-to-time. The pan & tilt mode works very well with hardly any lag & the preset positions are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: caravanj

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I now have five of these spread over two properties. In my view they offer the best value for the money. The software is good and easy to understand and the picture quality is good too. Above all, these cameras are easy to set up!! This is the most important factor to consider as some cameras almost require a physics degree to stand any chance. It's worth a try as the start up cost of these cameras is so small. On the down side, they seem a bit cheap and 'plasticky' but they work!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Poor night vision
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to replace another camera that was not very good. I selected TP-Link as they a a good make for other electronic devices, what a disappointment !! The night vision is poor when it works and that's not very often. Most times we walk past the camera at night it does not detect anything at all. Then for no reason it will start to pickup motion we we walk past. The video clip it then saves is utterly useless as faces can not be identified. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Bevy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap in price only .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the odd occasion we may be out for a while , I use it to keep an eye on our dog . I didn't want to spend Hive camera money so I opted for this at £19.99 . I was pleasantly surprised at how good it is , a doddle to set up , app easy to install . There is very slight motion lag but nothing to worry about . You cant go wrong for Twenty Quid , Happy days .
customer_reviews.author: C J A

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping an eye on the cats
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so we would know when the cats wanted to come back inside. Very easy to install and use. The app is also very helpful and a notification is sent to your mobile phone whenever motion is detected. You can also put the camera on “privacy mode” when you don’t want it in use. We don’t use night vision as we have the camera looking out a window so the infrared bounces straight back making the image appear black, so we turn the outside light on to counter this.
customer_reviews.author: Bat lover 🦇🖤

customer_reviews.title: It's ok not great
customer_reviews.text: Night vision does not work through windows the IR makes it reflect off the glass so it useless if you want to point this camera outside to check your drive or back garden and has to be set on day mode all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P G

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Straight to the point, Very disappointed about this camera, 1st the night vision is super poor almost doesn't exist. 2nd i dont if it camera itself or the app firmware, but struggling a lot when trying to set up the motion detection areas as the camera doesnt upload new view quickly if the angle was changed. To change the motion detection angle it may take up to 5hrs of waiting camera to reset. App isn't running smooth either, loading live stream pretty long and doesn't keep HD settings. Overpriced item for an unknown reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sarunas

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This camera does pretty much everything you want it to and is easy to set up on your phone via the app. The picture quality is good and movement and recording is easy. It's a very good price for this capability and allows you to put your toes in the water of remote security cameras. Two minor reservations. We were trying to spot an invading mouse and I am not clear what the size threshold for the motion detection is and if it's adjustable. The only other thing missing is a zoom facility, but at this price I'm not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: N. D. White

customer_reviews.title: Fab full function cctv
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I fixed it to underside of soffit board at front corner of house. Hardest part was running a 240V supply from within the loft and through the soffit. The performance of the camera and the functionality and ease of operation of the mobile app is fab. Camera has a decent wide angle. Definitely worth buying a128Gb SD-card for storing recordings. Notifications tell you of any sound or motion detection and you can view what happened away from home. You can also download any recording and share it. Absolutely delighted with it. Only unanswered questions are reliability and how it will withstand winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tricky Dicky

customer_reviews.title: No good for using with SKY Q wifi.
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my money with this it works on 2.4ghz latest modems etc default to 5ghz. Changing hub speed was and is a complete pain. Still not operational and now too late as location is shut down due to Virus outbreak. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wexford

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted inside front porch facing front door. Motion detected outside front door even on low sensitivity. Perfect picture quality can be used on 2 mobile phones. You can record to mobile phone as well as SIM card. Can also be used as video Phone call using built in mic and speaker. Camera Rotates and zooms from mobile app. Very Cheap at £24.99!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Never been let down by TP-Link before and this camera continues that trend. Excellent value for tiny cost. Setup in minutes and works perfectly. Integrated out of the box with my Google ecosystem. Even better it integrated neatly into my Blue Iris CCTV as well - no need to hack as is commonly required for other cameras in this price range (like the Yi range). Overall very happy with my purchase and will probably default to this as I expand my system
customer_reviews.author: Kartik P

customer_reviews.title: Useless would not connect
customer_reviews.text: Utterly useless. Would not Connect to the app. Numerous emails to the support desk who did not read the basic information and only advised me to reset my password. This item may be sophisticated but when it fails the support instructions are misleading and the help desk are incompetent and do not know the product. The box says the unit is a C200 But the app says a KC110, KC115 It is utter junk and I would not engage with tapo or tp-link again. Return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Miss L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after one I bought a few years ago failed to connect to the app. This one was VERY VERY easy to set up. The picture quality is pretty good. There is a feature to call the camera and have a 2way conversation as well as using it as an intercom. I was going to return this as I wanted one that pans/tilts but I decided to keep it and purchase the upgraded one also.
customer_reviews.author: Rogueless

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: They say you get what you pay for. This is nice little gadget and it does work well. There are couple issues but I use it to monitor my front of the house and drive. It does the job but obviously proper outdoor camera would be better. It sometimes struggles with WiFi connection even tho it is couple feet from router. In night mode there is glare when pointing at window. Would I buy again? Definitely yes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: 2 phones 1camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera, but I want to set up my wife's phone as well as mine so that we both can see the camera when we are out ,according to the instructions I have to deregister the camera before I can register again on my wife's phone, I want it on 2 phones at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marr

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money this camera is fantastic. I’ve tried a few different ones that were more expensive than this and they’ve not been very good in some way or another and I’ve ended up sending them back, but this is a good all rounder. Pros: Good day and night vision, easy to use app and easy set up The only con is that I bought this as it was KASA affiliated and thought I could use the same app as my KASA timers and bulbs but you can’t. No big problem though Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B's

customer_reviews.title: Great camera..BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Downside is unable to download recordings. You have to mess about removing the sd card, loading onto a laptop etc. I have other cameras from a different company and are able to download footage from the app
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid IP Cam let down by forced IR vision ruining external night time recording
customer_reviews.text: This £30 IP cam is streets ahead of the Wanscam I was using before to provide a 24/7 recording of the front of the house. The app is smooth, responsive and just works. Full HD with minimal streaming lag is fantastic, PTC function and wide angle lens are all great. But my old Wanscam can record out of a window at night so is still in use. A simple option of "IR ON/OFF" would have made this five stars. I went for an expensive Sandisk Endurance micro SD card to minimise issues with that 24/7 recording.
customer_reviews.author: Tonester

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The camera is okay the picture is blurred also on night mode it just puts all the images black so your carnt see anything but if you leave it in day mode it works better.. Also I've bought 3 memory cards for the camera and the camera keeps rejecting it saying that it won't accept it so I carnt have it on live video which is very disappointing. I wouldnt recommend as I carnt even use the camera properly due to it rejecting the micro sd card. You'll also find that it gets very hot
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap And Effective
customer_reviews.text: I put this on whenever my house is being left empty and gives me peace of mind that my home is safe in my absence. Cheap, easy to set up, easy to use, can access footage and turn it off and on with your phone at any time from anywhere. Great value for money purchase. Only downside is that the motion detection is very sensitive so I get a notification sometimes when the sun goes behind a cloud and the light in the hallway changes, but at least I know it is picking up all movement.
customer_reviews.author: Reliant.Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic budget entry motion camera
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this for the money. Super easy set up, clearer pictures than I could have hoped for. I only needed it for monitoring so I didn’t order an SD card but you need this if you do want to record and save, you can save live screenshots to the app. My friend bought one and recommended this to me and now I’ve recommended it to other friends/neighbours and another two have ordered. In the week I’ve had it I’ve only had one offline/technical issue, turning it off and on again resolved this. I suspect I’ll be buying more in the future for other areas of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As usual, another great TP-link product
customer_reviews.text: If you intend to get a cheap camera that supports pan and tilt for your home to monitor things, you will not go wrong with the Tapo C200. It is cost-effective and comes with good customer support and the quality of the video is excellent. I am using the app to control it together with my other TP-link smart appliance which is always nice to keep everything within one App. As a bonus, I found this product works well with Google home. I will definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a robust and affordable smart CCTV camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection is a very basic contrast based algorithm and as such, there's a lot of false positive detections. Other than that, considering the entire package, pricing included, this is excellent value. Already purchased 4 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan Lalut

customer_reviews.title: OK for indoor security cam, not a baby monitor though
customer_reviews.text: If you are after a cheap indoor security camera, this will do the job (but with no cloud storage any theif could easily destroy the evidence). The picture quality is good, as is sound from the device and the app is also good. This is partially listed as a baby monitor however and I wouldn't recommend it for that - the sound quality from the app to the camera is poor and even on the lowest sensitivity it will ping every few minutes as your child rolls over.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Colin Brain

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great. Easy to set up with alexa and the tapo app. Can insert SD card to record. Sends me a message when motion is detected through the app. Have now bought another one of these. The app is great in my opinion. I have it set up continuously recording but you can set it to motion detect. Sends me alerts when motion is detected and when i click the message it shows me the recording on the app. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a week and it caught someone vandalizing our car, Bang to rights i think is the expression, Yes a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fanrastic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a few indoor pet type cameras now,all have had some kind of disappointment, however this Tapo one is fantastic especially for the price,so cheap to say it moves around and has sound you can speak through your phone to the monitor. I can’t rave enough about this product very very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sarah lou

customer_reviews.title: Pan Tilt CCTV Camera
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for the money. I use this to monitor my mother in an assisted living building for peace of mind. I use it motion activated and so far its excellent. Sound isn't brilliant but the picture is. Also being able to tilt and pan adds just that but extra being able to view outside of her building when it's dark etc. I'm going to get a second now I've tried it out. More than happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit affordable just what I needed on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit wanted a bit if security without having the expensive cost of of CCTV installed bought this because of practicality of being able to move around the house if needed and the cost brilliant price no negatives as if yet only had a couple of days but so far so good may buy more if price stays the same
customer_reviews.author: a kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Mixed bag. Picture quality during the day is absolutely fine however the night vision is horrendous. It’s by far the worst I’ve seen, it is so bad that it might as well not have the function. It’s almost misleading as during the night it only shows what is directly in front of the camera. When the camera is on during the day it often works well but on the odd occasion it emits a screeching high pitched sound so we’ve had to stop using it which totally defeats the purpose of having one. Not worth the purchase for the seldom times it works
customer_reviews.author: A.W

customer_reviews.title: Really good product at a really good price
customer_reviews.text: An absolute bargain for the price. Good quality. Great picture quality night and day. Needs to be plugged in so not wireless. App is easy to use and camera very controllable. You can add a memory card easily and it formats by a couple of clicks. I used a 128mb but not sure of recording length. I use it to keep an eye on our pup and can download videos easily and send them to my wife. A great piece of kit and have decided to purchase 3 more for home security.
customer_reviews.author: Adam McBride

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this camera comes with fair amount of power cable which is very important to make installation possible,yes it took me about two hours to set up by the app but thats because im 58 years old,other than this its a great wee camera and great clear visions too and im buying second one shortly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pets
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 2 of these one for my dogs cage upstairs and the cage downstairs because my dog has had a major surgery where I need to see him (tplo where he broke a ligament) and these cameras have worked the charm they record when he is moving and when it hears sound and the night vision is brilliant I'm going to keep these for use after his "isolation" I also love the restart at 3am option cause my echo dot usually get blocked up and I sometimes have to unplug it and plug it back in
customer_reviews.author: Kai whetter

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Cracking piece of kit for the money. Unfortunately the IR causes reflection on a window in dark mode, so to combat that i have it mounted outside under a roof gutter an this seems to protect it from the elements. Its only meant for indoor use,but the difference to night mode is incredible. Been playing around with it now for a few days and im well chuffed. Im even able to share video recordings with my contacts .the attached pictures are straight from the camera using a day shot and a night shot. This is my actual footage.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor - homebridge compatible
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value for money. For those using FFMPEG and homebridge, this camera is compatible, they even have documentation on their website on how to get the RTSP stream. If you’re just going to use the TP Link app, it’s perfectly fine too. No cloud recording service, SD card required. Parents to be, don’t waste your time with an expensive baby monitor, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Class little camera for outside monitoring
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality little camera that I use to keep a watch on my driveway from the bedroom window, purchased with a memory card and it works perfectly day and night, check the app in the morning to see if any intruders have been wandering up the path, little bargain as I didn't want an outside camera with all the wiring, this just plugs in, although I did have a slight issue downloading the app and getting it to sync
customer_reviews.author: JC Liverpool

customer_reviews.title: Impressive kit - bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product at an amazing price. Don't get a Nest cam - do overt priced and this is just as good. We run Google in our house - Google home hub, chromecast etc. This works seamlessly with it. There is a back though - telling Google to play DogCam sends it to our tv in the living room - if I want to see it on a home hub I have to specify. I'm sure there is a way around that. Picture quality is superb. Love the motion alerts too.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Problem with recording in motion detection mode!
customer_reviews.text: For several days now, if I view footage in the playback mode and can see footage. After a couple of hours if I return to the playback footage again, it is as if the unit has just started recording and there is no footage available to be viewed. Has anyone else has this problem?
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: 'There is a problem with the SD card'
customer_reviews.text: Have tried everything and every range of SIM card yet there is a huge problem. No SD worked and you keep hearing the same sentence 'There is a problem with the SD card' and failed to format. This is really annoying as without live streaming you cant keep recording nor is there snapshots or motion. So even where there is motion, without an SD card there is no automatic record of the motion unless you go into the app on time to manually press record. Really unhappy with this problem and I've tried every solution possible.
customer_reviews.author: Rue

customer_reviews.title: New to Smart Home
customer_reviews.text: I’m a complete newbie to all things smart home but as a recent first time homebuyer I thought I’d give it a go! Having recently bought my first Alexa and reading up on various other smart technology decided to give this camera a go. I’m super impressed how easy it was to set up and to link with Alexa. It’s added peace of mind whilst I’m out of the house, and for checking on my dog. The motion alerts are really useful, but can easily be deactivated when home and the sensitivity can be changed to suit. The app is really user friendly and self explanatory. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service Support. Tough camera.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not saying the picture quality and night vision is amazing. But I am based on the price of the camera. I dropped the camera from approx 5’ onto concrete, snapped one of the bracket lugs but camera itself not damaged and working fine. (So robust) Did a live chat with customer services and 2 days later received a replacement bracket free of charge, so great customer service support.
customer_reviews.author: SFR

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre device! Scary audio!
customer_reviews.text: Cons Loud motor Scary audio. Never use to communicate with your child. Made the mistake and my baby was scared to return to room. No active motion. Objects have to pass view. No USB charging. Pros Small and unobtrusive Excellent software Good motion capture Software controlled movements. Good angle view Good sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sheeplette

customer_reviews.title: Gret item and will buy another
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and working very well. U can set alarm range, u can choose when to record i think it is great. I am enjoying looking on my phone in my bed to see who is at the door. I have it in my sitting room at the window. Night light not great with reflection, but all good.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I brought this camera so that I could watch over a elderly person who currently isn't feeling well while I'm at work or somewhere else everything works ok the image, NightVision and two way communication are all very good but unfortunately the wifi signal is extremely weak and is constantly disconnecting from the wifi and everytime it does that it doesn't reconnect so I have to plug it in and out that's with very good wifi also it's a big let down cause its actually a good little camera.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: For sub £30 this is excellent! Works with all my alexa’s, the tp link app and my synology nvr via the onvif protocol. Best bang for buck for an indoor camera! Best to read instructions but it works flawlessly. 10/10!!!
customer_reviews.author: JimJam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After a break in I just wanted for a deterrent, so they can see the camera and hopefully deter them. Set up done in ten minutes. Good feed to my mobile, and alert noise is excellent. Along with window vibration alarms I’m hoping to sleep better. Night vision good. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Croc watch.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use the motion function to keep an eye on my Argentine Tegu lizard. He's 4.6ft and about 6kg. Works perfectly so I can keep an eye because he triggers the motion sensor when he comes out to bask. Easy to set up and configure (using a TP LINK router). Can't comment on some of the functions but good quality and seems reliable. Easy to recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Hawtrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. Bought this as a baby cam for nursery and found the set up etc second time none and for the price very good. I intend on buying some more cameras for the other rooms too.
customer_reviews.author: peter j.

product_meta.title: TP-Link Tapo Pan/Tilt Smart Security Camera, Indoor CCTV, 360° Rotational View, Works with Alexa & Google Home, No Hub Required, 1080p, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, SD Storage, Free Tapo App (Tapo C200)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Pan Tilt Indoor CameraProtect your home and keep watch over those you care about most. TP-Link Tapo Smart Pan Tilt Security Camera is designed to deliver clear 1080p video the moment you start streaming, keeping you connected to your home anywhere you go. With 360° rotational and 114° vertical views, the pan tilt camera can monitor every angle of any room. Tapo C200 send notification to your phone every time it senses motion or sound. Pairs with Amazon Alexa and Google Home, so you can use your voice to control it even when your hands are full.
feature_bullets: No Hub Required - Works with any Wi-Fi router without the need for a separate hub
1080P HD with Pan Tilt - 360 Degree rotational and 114 Degree vertical views with 1080p resolution and night vision up to 30 ft
Two-way Audio - With built-in microphone and speaker, you can keep in touch with your family anytime, anywhere
Motion Detection and Activity Zones - Custom activity zones and notification will sent to your phone once motion is detected
SD Storage - Local storage supports up to 128 GB Micro SD card (SD card is not provided)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,728 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
